title: Should the Guild accept work from web2 clients?
body:
Raid Guild is primarily a web3 product development organization. However, clients occasionally come to us looking to hire the Guild for web2 projects.

The question posed here is whether we should be open to accepting web2 work if it meets the following conditions:
a. Raiders are available and want to work on the proposed project
b. The client can pay us in crypto

If the answer is Yes, then the Guild will accept work from web2 clients, and raiders on those raids will contribute spoils back to the Guild as with any other raid.

If the answer is No, then individual Guild members are free to independently contract with the client, with no requirement to contribute spoils back to the Guild.
choices: Yes, we should accept web2 client work
author: 0x15C6AC4Cf1b5E49c44332Fb0a1043Ccab19db80a
